opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we enable users to easily update their personal information on the website?
opportunities.evidence: I want to second your comments about not being able to update our information...
opportunities.user_need: Users want to maintain and update their own profiles without complex processes.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we improve the visibility and accessibility of the membership join workflow?
opportunities.evidence: It's remarkably convoluted... I feel very, very lucky when I find that button to join.
opportunities.user_need: New members need a simplified and clear process to join the club.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we create a centralized dashboard for users to track their registered events?
opportunities.evidence: I really want a my newcomers page that just lists in one place all of the events I'm registered for...
opportunities.user_need: Members need a way to see and manage their upcoming events easily.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we enhance the website's aesthetics to present a more modern image?
opportunities.evidence: Our website just kind of feels old... I don't want to be a member of an old person's club.
opportunities.user_need: Users desire a contemporary and appealing online presence.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we improve the event calendar's navigation and user experience?
opportunities.evidence: I find the calendaring part clunky... it just takes a bit more time, I think, to manage the calendar.
opportunities.user_need: Users want a more intuitive and less frustrating way to navigate the event calendar.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we implement automated notifications for members to update their information?
opportunities.evidence: Why not an automated announcement that goes out to everybody? Monthly update, have you moved, changed your telephone number...
opportunities.user_need: Members want reminders to keep their contact information current.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we facilitate weekend events for working members?
opportunities.evidence: I wish there were more events like during, like on the weekends or, you know, during the evening.
opportunities.user_need: Working members want more flexible event scheduling that accommodates their availability.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we improve the onboarding experience for new members?
opportunities.evidence: It was literally right at midnight and it was already full... People get in the book group and then they think they're in the book group.
opportunities.user_need: New members need clear guidance on how to participate and what the processes are.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we enhance communication about new events to ensure all members are informed?
opportunities.evidence: They should be highlighted in some way, and not just that you have to kind of burrow through to find them.
opportunities.user_need: Members want clear and prominent notifications for new events.

opportunities.opportunity_statement: How might we streamline the communication process for event organizers?
opportunities.evidence: It would be nice to be more creative, like a little more exciting... it's not that easy to find.
opportunities.user_need: Event organizers need tools that make it easy to communicate and promote events effectively.
